title: Kobold
contents: description | Sunlight Sensitivity | While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
description | Pack Tactics | The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
description | Dagger | Melee Weapon Attack: STR+2

title: Bugbear
contents: description | Brute | A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).
description | Surprise Attack. | If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 2D damage from the attack.
description | Morningstar | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D +1 (4D).
description | Javelin | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D (3D+2)
description | Javelin | Ranged Weapon Attack: range 30/120 ft. (2D+2)

title: Cave Rat
contents: description | Keen Smell | The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell

title: Dire Rat
contents: description | Keen Smell | The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell

title: Goblin
contents: description | Nimble Escape | The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
description | Scimitar | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D (2D+2)
description | Shortbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: range 80/320 ft 4D

title: Hobgoblin
contents: description | Martial Advantage | Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 2D damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.
description | Longsword | Melee Weapon Attack: STR+1D+1 (3D+2)
description | Longbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: range 150/600 ft., 5D

title: Skeleton
contents: property | Languages | Understand Common; cannot speak
description | Shortsword | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D (3D+1)
description | Shortbow | Ranged Weapon Attack:  range 80/320 ft., 4D

title: Shadow
contents: description | Amorphous | The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
description | Shadow Stealth | While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
description | Sunlight Weakness | While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

description | Strength Drain | Melee Weapon Attack: 2D+2 necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by 1 pip. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
text | If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

title: Ice Mephit
contents: description | Death Burst | When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 2D slashing damage on a failed save.
description | False Appearance | While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.
description | Innate Spellcasting | (1/Day). The mephit can innately cast fog cloud.
description | Frost Breath | (Recharge 6). The mephit exhales a 15- foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, 2D cold damage on a failed save.

title: Balsag the Hunter (Bugbear)
contents: description | Brute | A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).
description | Surprise Attack. | If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 2D damage from the attack.
description | Morningstar | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D +1 (4D).
description | Javelin | Melee Weapon Attack: STR + 1D (3D+2)
description | Javelin | Ranged Weapon Attack: range 30/120 ft. (2D+2)

title: Calvin (White Dragon Wrymling)
contents: description | Cold Breath | The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, 5D+2 cold damage on a failed save

title: Dragon Priest (Troll)
contents: description | Keen Smell | The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

description | Regeneration | The troll regains at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with incapacitated and doesn't regenerate.
description | Multiattack | The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

title: Troll
contents: description | Keen Smell | The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

description | Regeneration | The troll regains at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with incapacitated and doesn't regenerate.
description | Multiattack | The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

title: Durnn (Hobgoblin)
contents: description | Martial Advantage | Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 2D damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.
description | Longsword | Melee Weapon Attack: STR+1D+1 (3D+2)
description | Longbow | Ranged Weapon Attack: range 150/600 ft., 5D
